subject: Football
Mascots
Names, Organizational
Native Americans
lead_paragraph: Suzan Shown Harjo, 68, has been at the center of efforts to persuade sports teams to drop American Indian names and mascots considered derogatory for decades.
snippet: Suzan Shown Harjo, 68, has been at the center of efforts to persuade sports teams to drop American Indian names and mascots considered derogatory for decades.
